( 3 ) We compare with three LSTM models ( Tang et al. , 2015 a ) ) .
In LSTM , a LSTM based recurrent model is applied from the start to the end of a sentence , and the last hidden vector is used as the sentence representation .
TDLSTM extends LSTM by taking into account of the aspect , and uses two LSTM networks , a forward one and a backward one , towards the aspect .
TDLSTM + ATT extends TDLSTM by incorporating an attention mechanism ( Bahdanau et al. , 2015 ) over the hidden vectors .
